triples.name: Chatbot
triples.relevance: Chatbots are the primary application domain that Xatkit addresses through its framework.

triples.name: Voice user interface
triples.relevance: Voicebots leverage voice user interfaces for spoken human-computer interaction, which Xatkit supports.

triples.name: E-commerce
triples.relevance: E-commerce is identified as a key domain where chatbot applications are deployed.

triples.name: Customer service
triples.relevance: Customer service is a primary application domain for chatbot deployments.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: NLP engines are core components that can be swapped in Xatkit-based chatbots.

triples.name: Domain-specific language
triples.relevance: Xatkit proposes using DSLs as a key innovation for platform-independent chatbot definition.

triples.name: Modular programming
triples.relevance: Xatkit introduces a modular architecture that facilitates independent evolution of its components.
